content: anivia is a sweet little triangular lace shawlette knit sideways from one corner the sample shown uses a single 100g skein of 4ply / fingering weight yarn but you could make this shawl much larger if preferred and the pattern includes details on how to do so with a simple lace pattern this shawl is the perfect introduction to lace knitting the pattern includes both written and charted instructions **materials ** 420yds / 384m 4ply / fingering weight yarn 3 75mm / us5 needles **finished measurements ** 56 wide x 28 at deepest point 142 x 71cm ***like verily knits patterns sign up to the newsletter here 2 to be the first to hear about new releases or follow verilyknits 3 on instagram don t forget to tag your photos #verilyknits*** 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/verily-knits/4009010/1-25#1 2 https //verilyknits us13 list-manage com/subscribe u=0c0004752d65d41ae8f42d68a&id=4463555420 3 https //www instagram com/verilyknits/
